page.title: 04SURVEY OF EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
{ SURVEY OF{EMPLOYMENT}IN NEWCASTLETON
We compared the kinds of{employment}of parents in Newcastleton Primary School to{employment}of people in{Douglas {Square. 1.{Forestry: Forest}covers 4.5 kilometres square of our area but the percentage of parents working in the {forestry}is 23%. In{Douglas Square}the percentage of people working in the {Forestry}Commission is 16%. The cause of it is that the{Forestry}Commission do only employ a small number of people of people to fell,sned and process them. 2.{Farming:}Farms cover 7 square kilometres yet the percentage of the parents working as farmers is 17%.The percentage of the people that work in {Farming}in{Douglas Square-
